title: Body copy typeface to accompany Sackers Gothic?
content:
Hello there. I'm after a simple body typefaces to pair with Sackers (which is the brand/title face). Any classic combos I might not have considered?

Thanks.
author: Jim Stafford

comments.content:
So, you’re asking us to guess what you’ve considered?  
You could at least provide a multiple choice quiz.

[http://www.rolex.com/watches/oyster.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416161745/http:/www.rolex.com/watches/oyster.html "http://www.rolex.com/watches/oyster.html")
